process.title: Step-by-Step Application Process
process.subtitle: From initial counseling to boarding the plane, we guide you at every step to make your study abroad journey smooth.

setps.title: Career Counseling
setps.description: Our experienced counselors discuss your interests, career goals, and academic aspirations. We help you choose the best path for studying in Japan and answer all your queries about courses and universities.

setps.title: Course & University Selection
setps.description: We assist you in shortlisting universities and courses based on your profile, budget, and preferences. You get personalized advice to choose the program that fits your goals and increases your chances of admission.

setps.title: Application & Documentation
setps.description: We guide you in preparing and submitting all necessary documents, including academic transcripts, recommendation letters, and application forms. Our team ensures that your application is complete, accurate, and submitted on time.

setps.title: Visa & Approval
setps.description: Once admission is confirmed, we provide step-by-step assistance with the student visa application, including document verification and submission. We help you track your application until you receive the visa approval.

setps.title: Pre-Departure Orientation
setps.description: Before your departure, we conduct orientation sessions covering Japanese culture, academic expectations, housing, banking, and essential life skills. This ensures you are well-prepared and confident to start your journey in Japan.

about.heading: About GSR
about.subheading: We are committed to guiding students towards global educational opportunities with integrity and care.

intro.heading: Who Are We?
intro.p1: At GSR Educational Academy , we deliver world-class education that empowers learners globally. Our platform integrates cutting-edge pedagogy, interactive technologies , and expert guidance to ensure every student gains practical competencies essential for success.
intro.p2: Through curated programs in languages, skill development, and professional training, we cultivate intellectual curiosity ,cross-cultural understanding , and career readiness We transform learning into a holistic journey ‚Äîflexible, engaging, and tailored to each student.

founder.heading: Message from the founder
founder.p1: ‚ÄúWhen I started this institute 8 years ago, my vision was simple: to create a place where students could learn Japanese, Korean, and English not just as subjects, but as tools to unlock their dreams. Over the years, I have seen thousands of students walk into our classrooms with hope in their eyes‚Äîand walk out with
founder.p2: I believe language learning is not about perfection on the first day; it is about progress every single day. Success comes step by step.
founder.p3: Every letter you learn, every sentence you practice, every conversation you try‚Äîthese are the steps that build your success. Our promise is to guide, motivate, and celebrate every milestone with you.

ceo.heading: Message from the CEO
ceo.p1: Languages are bridges to opportunities, cultures, and dreams. Our mission is to help students master Japanese, Korean, and English with confidence, connecting with the world and creating brighter futures.
ceo.p22: Imagine the rabbit who never stops‚Äîfocused, disciplined, and humble. No tortoise could win against that.
ceo.p3: That is our vision for you: learn step by step with consistency, move forward with
ceo.p4: Each lesson is a step closer to your dream.

hero.heading: Documentation & Visa Guidance
hero.subheading: We assist students at every step‚Äîfrom document preparation to pre-departure orientation‚Äîfor Japanese, Korean, and English programs. Our team coordinates with professional consultants and licensed manpower agencies to ensure smooth processing.

steps.title: Document Preparation
steps.description: The first step is to gather all necessary documents, including passports, citizenship certificates, birth certificates, and police clearances. Academic transcripts, character certificates, and skill certificates must be verified and organized. Proper document preparation reduces errors, avoids delays, and ensures smooth processing. Having documents ready in advance also saves time and builds confidence when submitting forms to consultants or authorities.

steps.title: Application & Visa Processing
steps.description: During visa processing, accuracy and attention to detail are crucial. Each application form should be completed carefully to avoid errors in spelling, dates, and signatures. Coordination with licensed consultants ensures that financial documents, affidavits, and sponsorship papers meet all requirements. Proper verification and submission significantly increase the chances of visa approval and prevent unnecessary delays or rejections.
keyPoints: Avoid errors in spelling, dates, and signatures
Financial documents, affidavits, and sponsorship papers

steps.title: Final Preparation & Departure
steps.description: The final step ensures that students are fully prepared for departure. Pre-departure orientation covers Japanese, Korean, and English lifestyle, culture, workplace etiquette, and daily routines. Assistance with ticketing, travel preparation, and last-minute guidance helps students feel confident, safe, and ready for their journey. This step reduces anxiety, improves readiness, and ensures a smooth transition into life abroad.
keyPoints: Japanese, Korean, and English lifestyle and culture

hero.heading: Selected FAQ's
hero.subheading: Find answers to the most common questions about Japan Student & SSW and our Institute.

items.question: Q1. What is the difference between a Student Visa and SSW?
items.answer: A Student Visa allows study in Japan, while SSW allows direct employment.

items.question: Q2. Can I apply for both Student Visa and SSW?
items.answer: You must choose one; applying for both is not allowed.

items.question: Q3. How much Japanese proficiency is required?
items.answer: Student Visa requires JLPT/NAT N5. SSW requires JLPT/NAT N4 and a skill test.

items.question: Q4. Which exam is valid, JLPT or NAT?
items.answer: Both JLPT and NAT exams are valid.

items.question: Q5. Can I work part-time as a student?
items.answer: Students can work up to 28 hours per week with permission.

items.question: Q6. Do I need work experience for SSW?
items.answer: Work experience is not always required, but passing the skill test is mandatory.

items.question: Q7. Can a Student Visa be changed to SSW?
items.answer: A Student Visa can be changed to SSW after passing the language and skill test.

items.question: Q8. Which is better, Student Visa or SSW?
items.answer: Student Visa is better for higher education and long-term careers, while SSW is better for immediate work and income.

items.question: Q9. Who are the teachers?
items.answer: Classes are taught by experienced Nepali and Japanese instructors.

items.question: Q10. Do you provide visa processing services?
items.answer: Full visa processing guidance and support are provided at every step.

items.question: Q11. What are the class timings?
items.answer: Classes are available in morning, day, and evening shifts.

items.question: Q12. Do you provide support after reaching Japan?
items.answer: Yes, we provide support in connecting with schools or companies after arriving in Japan.
